bibl.title: Studies in Methodology in Textual Criticism of the New Testament
bibl.note: Reproduit de: Scribal Habits in Early Papyri: A Study in the Corruption of the Text, The Bible in Modern Scholarship (Nashville, N.Y., 1965) pp. 370-389.
bibl.seg: Colwell Ernest Cadman, Method in Evaluating Scribal Habits. A Study of P45, P66, P75.
Studies in Methodology in Textual Criticism of the New Testament = New Testament Tools and Studies. 9 (Leiden, 1969) pp. 106-124.
